notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: R.C.S. and S.C.P. jointly identified the research objectives and designed the research methodology, R.C.S. conducted the majority of the analyses, S.C.P. analyzed the AERONET observations, and S.C.P. and R.C.S. jointly wrote the manuscript. R.C.L. and A.M.S. provided expertise on the MERRA-2 dataset, and discussed and commented on the manuscript.
